data.text:
Yol - The Way - Original Vintage Film Poster

Category Original Vintage Film Poster Genre Drama Year 1982 Film Star Tarik Akan, film by Yilmaz Guney, Dir: Serif Goren Size UK Quad 28 1/2 x 38 1/2 inch Condition A Grade (click for details) Price

£sold

PLEASE NOTE: UK ORDERS ARE AUTOMATICALLY CHARGED £10 POSTAGE AND PACKING AT CHECKOUT

PLEASE NOTE: INTERNATIONAL ORDERS WILL BE INVOICED EXTRA POSTAGE OF £15 AFTER CHECKOUT

Details While in prison for political offenses Yilmaz Guney smuggled explicit instructions to Serif Goren to produce this critically acclaimed film. Special Artificial Eye custom printed Lumiere Cinema London British Quad film poster.

To purchase please click the Add to Cart button.

Please email info@originalposter.co.uk or telephone 01905 620370 if you need further assistance.
